alert.note: Alert for Apple and Lucerne Valleys (California) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Excessive Heat Warning issued July 10 at 8:40PM PDT until July 16 at 8:00PM PDT by NWS SanDiego
info.description: ...EXCESSIVE HEAT WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM 10 AM TUESDAY TO 8 PM PDT SUNDAY... * WHAT...Dangerously hot conditions with temperatures up to 112 expected. * WHERE...Apple and Lucerne Valleys. * WHEN...From 10 AM Tuesday to 8 PM PDT Sunday. * IMPACTS...Extreme heat will significantly increase the potential for heat related illnesses, particularly for those working or participating in outdoor activities. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Hottest weather expected Friday through the weekend. The heat is likely to continue into next week.
info.instruction: Take extra precautions if you work or spend time outside. When possible, reschedule strenuous activities to early morning or evening.
